title.rendered: 116 The 1st way to increase Amazon Sales  (Part 1 of 5 of increasing profits)

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 6:44 — 6.2MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

The first way to increase Sales (and thus increase profits) is the best-known way: get more customers.

On Amazon this primarily comes down to the basics of:

  1. Ranking for high volume (or low-volume but high-converting) keywords on Page 1. (Impressions). PPC plays its part as does optimizing your product listing.
  2. Getting Amazon shoppers to click through to your listing – a keen price and great photo are key.  (Clicks/sessions)
  3. Getting people who view your product page to buy (Conversions). Again a keen price helps, followed closely by fantastic images and well written bullet points.

Of course, there are many other ways but these are the simplest and most direct.

However, this is only 1 of 3 fundamental strategies, most of which are neglected by most Amazon sellers. Find out what the other two are in the next episodes…

To find out more about the Amazing FBA London Mastermind mentioned in the episode, click here

Watch The 1st way to increase Amazon Sales (Part 1 of 5 of increasing profits)
